ing: 2 large avocados, flesh removed and mashed
2 (10 ounce) baskets cherry tomatoes, quartered and seeded
2 teaspoons ground black pepper, or to taste
des: "Simple, easy, and delicious guacamole, perfect for Cinco de Mayo."
ins: Mix avocado, tomatoes, onion, jalapeno pepper, and garlic together in a bowl. Stir lime juice into the avocado mixture. Season with salt, black pepper, and cayenne pepper.
